hotel_name: Radisson Blu Plaza Bangkok (SHA Plus+)
title: Cheap 5 starsβ€
content:
It is very cheap cause it is 5 stars hotel. Location is good, close to asok bts. Nice transportation but heavy traffic. 
Room looks quite clean, but never use electronic kettle. Dirty and rusty inside. 
Normally staffs are nice but need more staffs in that size. Slow customer service.

hotel_name: The Standard, Bangkok Mahanakhon
title: Second stay reviewβ€
content:
Pros: Good location / Attractive hotel interior / Friendly staff / Excellent facilities

This is my second visit, and compared to my first visit, the observatory visit time had been changed from 7 pm. 
When I arrived at 6:55, I had to wait for 5 minutes, while other guests who arrived at 6:58 were allowed to enter the observatory right away. 
It was unpleasant for the staff to arbitrarily apply the observatory entry time to customers. 
During my first stay, it was possible to visit the indoor observatory on the 73rd or 74th floor, but this time it was inaccessible. 
However, since this is an additional service provided by the hotel, it did not have a significant impact on my overall evaluation of the hotel.

Bath salts were provided but were missing. 
I felt that around 50% of the guests were Chinese, 30% were Korean, and 20% were from other countries.

In conclusion, I am generally satisfied, but I do not plan to make a third visit.

hotel_name: λ” λΈ”λ μ¤ νΈν…” μ•¤ λ μ§€λμ¤ (The Bless Hotel & Residence)
title: Thank you, Bless Hotel staff!!β€
content:
When I stay in Bangkok, I think of this hotel as the first and second priority. 
When I visited in April this year, I was disappointed because it was different from visiting Bless Hotel before Corona. 

As a result of my visit again this time, I felt that many things have improved. 

1. a friendly staff.
2. a clean room condition.
3. The old swimming pool has also been improved. 

When I recently visited with my acquaintances in August, I was very satisfied with the hotel's modifications after knowing the customer's feedback. 

It is a hotel that I will think of as the first and second priority when I visit Bangkok next time.

title: Chiang Mai Orchid Hotelβ€
content: Very friendly staff, good safe which was always open 24 Hrs., Breakfeast was always OK for the price, room big and cleaned everyday. Things you exspect for a room of this categorie was available. The gym was the bigest, but I have seen far worse ones. The saua was good, but missed a pool with cold water. Overall a good Hotel, but not centrally located. Tuk Tuk not expensive and always available

I left my laptop in the room while tied up at the hotel.
It's a mistake if it's wrong to put the laptop on the bed, but when I used it in the morning and went out, the MacBook was fine.
It's a part that opens and closes by hand every time, so it's a part I touch every time I use it. I think the housekeeper dropped it while cleaning. However, when I contacted the hotel directly, they took pictures and acted as if they were going to do something. they got my phone number and e-mail, but there was no contact until I checked out the next day.
So, when we went out to check out, another staff member showed up from somewhere 
she said β€i asked the housekeeper but our staff said no, we believe the staffβ€ It was just the way it was dealt with. For those who will be staying here, arrange all items in a suitcase and close them.
They take no responsibility and pretend not to know.
In terms of evaluation except for that day, the breakfast is normal. Soundproofing is a bit disappointing because it is a connecting room. The swimming pool is so pretty, but the pool equipment was rusty, and when I look down from the terrace, there are a lot of unidentified bubbles floating in the pool in front of the bar. and there are so many children  so it seems difficult for couples or friends to pla

hotel_name: νΈν…” λΉ„μ¤νƒ€ (Hotel Vista)
title: Good for the price.β€
content:
I chose Vista Hotel as a cost-effective hotel for my family trip.
In conclusion, it was very good.
The staff were friendly and the room was in good condition.
The location was convenient to go to the market, terminal 21, and the beach was very close.
